snippet: Wall Street was encouraged that the Federal Reserve had no big surprises in mind.
abstract: Federal Reserve's latest economic update reverses listless slide in stock market, giving Standard & Poor's 500-stock index another nominal record-high close.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street was encouraged that the Federal Reserve had no big surprises in mind.

headline.main: Fed’s Economic Report Gives Markets a Lift
headline.print_headline: Fed’s Economic Report Gives Markets a Lift
